introduction: Wikipedia articles me citation khoje ke madat karo!
instructions_goal: Niche ke Wikipedia snippet ke koi reliable source backup nai karis hai. Aap ek ke paae saktaa hai?
instructions_details: Wikipedia pe jaae ke snippet ke fix kar ke khaatir, nai to, duusra waala dekhe ke khatir %s pe click karo. Agar aap ke koi sawaal hae tab %s ke check karo. Good luck!
lead_section_hint: Ii text article ke lead section ke hissa hai, tab iske reference kare ke jaruuri nai hai. Meharbaani kar ke, aur jaan kari ke khaatir %s ke dekho.
github_link_title: Hey! Hamaar source GitHub me hai!
beginners_hint: Citation jorre nai jantaa hai? %s ke dekho.
page_not_found: Panna ke nai paawa gais hai!
page_not_found_text: Jon panna ke aap khojtaa hae, abhi exist nai hoe hai - saait ii citation ke paae lewaa gais hai? Aur ke khaatir pichhe %s pe jaao !
footer: %s ke volunteers banaain hai, jiske %s me host karaa gais hai aur %s se translate karaa gais hai.
